DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect lumen-apposing metal stent ( LAMS ) traditional plastic stent drainage pancreatic pseudocyst , mainly observe cyst recurrence rate 12 month treatment .
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion 1 . Subject age 18-80 year old 2 . Subject pancreatic pseudocysts confirm CT 3 . Subject history MSAP SAP , pseudocysts form 3 month 4 . The size pseudocyst 6 cm , cyst adjacent gastric wall 5 . Subject symptom relate pseudocyst 6 . The consent form sign Exclusion criterion 1 . Subject young 18 year old 80 year 2 . Pancreatic pseudocyst communicate main pancreatic duct 3 . Subject ca n't accept endoscopic procedure 4 . Pancreatic pseudocyst infection subject diagnose pancreatic abscess 5 . The distance gastric wall pseudocyst 1 cm 6 . Subject 2 2 cyst 7 . Subject blood coagulation dysfunction 8 . Pregnant subject mental disorder
